item.title: We paid my daughter and son-in-law’s mortgage when it reached $76K. Here’s why we chose that magic figure.
item.description: “My husband, daughter, son-in-law and I all went to the bank.”

item.title: I’m 46 and I’m still use my ex-boyfriend’s Netflix account. Is that stealing?
item.description: “I’m still renting, believe it or not, and he has his own place.”

item.title: My friend, who had no children or wife, died suddenly. His sister is contesting his will. Will she succeed?
item.description: “He did not intend to leave anything to his sister, his only living relative.”
